definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: A few months later my younger brother enlisted as a bugler .
sentences.chinese: 幾個月以後，我弟弟作爲號兵應徵入伍。

sentences.english: Now sound no note O trumpeters.
The trumpeter taken prisonerstrumpeter was captured by his enemy in a battle.
sentences.chinese: 在一場戰爭中，有個號兵被敵人抓獲了。

sentences.english: Far away he could hear trumpeters sounding reveille.
sentences.chinese: 他可以聽到遠處號兵在吹起牀號。
